channel.title: notes on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in notes on Barefoot Rob

item.title: notes from ETJ workshop
item.description: 10:32 Sunday 31 May 2015 JST workshop today 16:47 The workshop was quite great, though specifically geared toward teaching children. I’m sure I’ll be able to apply some of the stuff I learned to my classes. Mostly I learned “It’s not the answer that matters so much; it’s the thinking.” This quote might summarize the content of the workshop and the presentation of the workshop itself. And I tried to play it cool, but I got big crush on K, next to whom I sat during the second half.

item.title: upgrading server
item.description: 06:34 Sunday 17 May 2015 JST I woke up early to upgrade the server: sudo do-release-upgrade “Installing the upgrade can take several hours….” I read that and noped out! I better let the client know first! sudo apt-get upgrade for now.
